instructions: Pour evaporated milk, canned cream, and sweetened condensed milk into a blender; tear bread into pieces and add to blender. Add cardamom and almonds; blend until liquified, 3 to 4 minutes. Pour into a 9x13-inch glass dish and freeze 8 hours or overnight before cutting into squares and serving.
ingredients: 2 (7.6 ounce) cans canned table cream (media crema)
title: Easy and Yummiest Kulfi Recipe
